report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-0477 GitLab Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-0477 GitLab Vulnerability
text: GitLab is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by uncontrolled resource consumption. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.
